scripts.deploy:oidc: cd cdk && npx cdk deploy github-oidc --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:app: cd cdk && npx cdk deploy password-manager-backend-prod --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:all: cd cdk && npx cdk deploy --all --require-approval never
scripts.diff:oidc: cd cdk && npx cdk diff github-oidc
scripts.diff:app: cd cdk && npx cdk diff password-manager-backend-prod
scripts.destroy:app: cd cdk && npx cdk destroy password-manager-backend-prod
